alert.note: Alert for Ashtabula Lakeshore; Lake (Ohio) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued December 24 at 8:52PM EST by NWS Cleveland
info.description: ...A heavy lake effect snow band will affect Lake and northern Ashtabula Counties Until 1015 PM EST.... At 845 PM EST, radar indicated a heavy lake effect snow band along the shoreline in Lake and Ashtabula Counties. HAZARDS INCLUDE... Southwest winds to 40 mph... Visibility rapidly dropping to less than a quarter of a mile... Roads becoming snow covered... Locations impacted include... Painesville, Ashtabula, Willowick, Conneaut, Fairport Harbor, Geneva-On-The-Lake, Mentor, Willoughby, Eastlake, Geneva, Madison, North Kingsville, Perry, Timberlake, Lakeline, Wickliffe, Willoughby Hills, Mentor-On-The-Lake, Kirtland and Kingsville. Use extra caution if you must travel into or through this lake effect snow band. Rapid changes in visibility and potentially slick roads due to falling and blowing snow are likely. This band of snow will affect Route 2 and portions of I-90. Use extra caution if traveling this evening. && ODOT DMS 314, 315, 326, 330, and 332.
